name: Foxtrot Bunny
description:
Prototype for a 1-minute, side-scroll shooter where everything is destructible. Find and terminate the boss before time runs out.

Note: Ran out of time for a jam, so boss is unfinished, but hopefully you enjoy what I was going for! You can hold the left-mouse button to shoot the fully-auto shoot the gun.

Credit:

  • Boss, Music, Cover Art: Azivar
  • Programming, Miscellaneous Art: Clang
  • Bunny, Saw, and Spike Sprite: Kenney
  • Tilemap and Background: Shackhal
